Name: Neocense
About the game: Neocense is a 2D isometric puzzle game made in Unity. Explore the world of Cha as Amori, who has just discovered she has a rare gift called the Cense; she can connect with spirits and enter the realm of passing. Through seeking the truth about her identity, Amori delves deeper into Chas past, The Hunters Army, and the history they've tried to bury. It's only a matter of time before she realizes the hardest unturned stones are the ones weighted with grief, and it's these which reveal the most about us. Complete Puzzles Preform Spirit Rituals Fight the Hunters Learn about Amoris Tale Uncover the Story of Cha Honorable Mentions 20 Unique Scenes Great Soundtrack Created By Students
